Literature.Title: A naturally inspired antibiotic to target multidrug-resistant pathogens.
Literature.Author: Wang Z, Koirala B, Hernandez Y, Zimmerman M, Park S, Perlin DS, Brady SF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium Com15(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SH1000(MIC=>128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae 10031(MIC=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978 (pMQ124xlab1-mcr-1)(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae 0150(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=2µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=1µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883 (pMQ124-mcr-1)(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii SM1536(MIC=2µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii SM1536 (pMQ124xlab1-mcr-1)(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047 (△phoP/Q+phoP/Q)(MIC=2µg/ml),Neisseria gonorrhoeae 49226(MIC=8µg/ml),Neisseria meningitidis 13090(MIC=32µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris 49132(MIC=4µg/ml),Moraxella osloensis 10973(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=0.5-4µg/ml)
